post.author: Zasz
post.title: Greatest Content of late 2008
post.content:
Great Book content : 

 

After finishing "Brisingr", I was left a bit let down, lot of description and ordinary day to day stuff that Eragon is doing. No great Magic done , No big War fought.. no adventure ... all i can say is we might expect better from the Second Part of Brisingr, which will come out whenever Paolini decides it comes out.

 

Clive Cussler new Dirk Pitt novels are out. Asterix - also a few Omnibus series are out - great reading.

 

JK Rowlings book is also a choice though I haven laid my hands on it yet - the one about that stories of a bard and the wand Deathstick

 

Great Game content : 

 

Meanwhile Diablo 3 with its Gameplay trailers, Impressive site (featuring Archangel Tyrel), is occupying the attention... damn blizzard takes its time. Thinking of using the fansite kit for diablo also :-)

 

Prince of Persia is absolutely great... though there's not much of the story we all like in the previous versions.. 

 

Great Music content :

 

Kayne West  -  808's and HeartBreak  (album)   [See you in my nightmares ft Lil Wayne]

Justin Timberlake ft Timbaland  -  Good Foot  (song in album "Mr. Timberlake")

Gym Class Heros  -  The Quilt  (album) 

T.I. - Paper Trail  (album)

-> T.I.-On Top Of The World (Ft. Ludacris & B.O.B.)

-> T.I.-Sying Ya Rag (Ft. Swizz Beatz)

-> T.I.-Swagga Like Us (Ft. Kanye West, Jay Z & Lil Wayne)

Nelly  -  Brass Knuckles (album) 

Akon  -  Freedom
